snippet: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick said Wednesday the letter he wrote to Donald Trump before Election Day was done out of a friendship that goes back many years and was not politically motivated, while Tom Brady said he preferred to focus o...
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick said Wednesday the letter he wrote to Donald Trump before Election Day was done out of a friendship that goes back many years and was not politically motivated, while Tom Brady said he preferred to focus on football and wouldn't elaborate on his relationship with him.

headline.main: Belichick Says Letter to Trump 'Not Politically Motivated'
headline.print_headline: Belichick Says Letter to Trump 'Not Politically Motivated'
